name: com.helteix.channeled-properties
description:
Advanced package based on the broker patterns, granting the ability to have multiple object influencing a property without dependencies. 
The owner can listen and update only when the 'value' changes without knowing how it changed, who was responsible and where it occured.

samples.description: Showcase of how to use the Condition class
Showcase of how to use the Formulas class
Showcase of how to use the Priorities class
